title: 【如何準備英語面試1】Why are you interested in this job? 為什麼你會對這個工作感興趣？

json.text: Why are you interested in this job?
This is exactly what I want to do. As you can see in my resume,
I possess all the skills required and I’m well-qualified for the position. It seems
like a perfect fit. My career goal is to become a CFO and this
job would allow me to develop my potential to reach that goal.
